channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring by VMware -- Spring Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spring by VMware -- Spring Security

item.title: CVE-2020-5408|2024-09-17T01:01:47.960Z -- spring%20by%20vmware -- spring%20security
item.description: Spring Security versions 5.3.x prior to 5.3.2, 5.2.x prior to 5.2.4, 5.1.x prior to 5.1.10, 5.0.x prior to 5.0.16 and 4.2.x prior to 4.2.16 use a fixed null initialization vector with CBC Mode in the implementation of the queryable text encryptor. A malicious user with access to the data that has been encrypted using such an encryptor may be able to derive the unencrypted values using a dictionary attack.
